seo.title: Welcome to Qr Qaema
seo.description: Experience the most advanced QR menu system designed for modern restaurants.
seo.keywords: QR menu, digital menu, restaurant technology, online ordering, QR codes, order management
seo.author: Qr Qaema

og.title: Qr Qaema - Leading QR Menu Solution
og.description: Qr Qaema offers a cutting-edge digital solution to manage and display restaurant menus through QR codes.

twitter.title: Qr Qaema - Your Comprehensive Digital Restaurant Solution
twitter.description: Discover Qr Qaema, the premier choice for digital menu management and online ordering.

hero.title: Welcome to Qr Qaema
hero.subtitle: Transforming Restaurant Menus for the Digital Age

feature1.title: Customizable Menus
feature1.description: Easily design and update your restaurant's menu to reflect your brand and offerings.

feature2.title: Seamless QR Code Integration
feature2.description: Provide customers with instant access to your menu through unique QR codes at each table.

feature3.title: Real-Time Order Management
feature3.description: Manage and track customer orders efficiently with our intuitive platform.

step1.title: Set Up Your Restaurant Profile
step1.description: Create an account and establish your restaurant's digital presence with our easy setup process.

step2.title: Generate Unique QR Codes
step2.description: Create personalized QR codes for each table, ensuring a smooth customer experience.

step3.title: Manage Orders Digitally
step3.description: Allow customers to place orders directly from their smartphones and manage them in real-time.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Enjoy all our features absolutely free.
pricing.description: Access all features at no cost, with no hidden fees.

testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.testimonial1: Qr Qaema revolutionized our order management system.
testimonials.testimonial2: Our customers appreciate the ease of scanning QR codes.
testimonials.testimonial3: A game changer for our restaurant operations!

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Restaurant?
cta.subtitle: Sign up today to streamline your menu and order management.

footer.rights: Â© 2024 Qr Qaema. All rights reserved.

errors.requiredFields: Please fill in both the username and password.
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

tour.header: This is the Restaurant Management Header where you can manage restaurant details and user actions.
tour.headerLogout: Click here to securely log out from your account.
tour.headerManageEmployees: Click here to manage your restaurant's staff, including adding and removing employees.
tour.headerManageMenu: This section allows you to manage the restaurant's menu, including categories and individual menu items.
tour.headerManageCategories: Use this section to manage different menu categories in your restaurant.
tour.headerManageMenuItems: Here you can manage individual menu items under different categories.
tour.headerProfile: Here you can view and update your profile details, such as your username and other personal information.
tour.headerLanguageSelector: Change the display language of the system using this dropdown.
tour.headerBrand: This is your restaurant's brand/logo displayed on the dashboard.
tour.completedOrdersCard: View the number of completed orders in this section.
tour.inProgressOrdersCard: This card shows orders that are currently being prepared in the kitchen.
tour.pendingOrdersCard: Here you can see all pending orders waiting for approval.
tour.helpRequestSection: This is where you manage help requests from customers.
tour.helpRequestItem: Manage individual help requests from customers, such as assistance with orders or services.
tour.addTableButton: Click here to add a new table to your restaurant. Each new table gets assigned a unique QR code.
tour.tableCard: Each card represents a table in your restaurant. Click to view or manage the orders for this table.
tour.recentOrdersTable: This table shows the most recent orders placed by customers.
tour.replayTour: Replay this guided tour at any time to familiarize yourself with the dashboard.
tour.headerViewMenu: Click here to view the restaurant's menu.

helpRequest.enterResponseValidation: Please enter a response before submitting.

helpRequest.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this help request?
